turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I need to check my current balance. Can you help me with that?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Certainly! To verify your identity, please provide the last four digits of your social security number and your date of birth.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, it's XXXX and 01/01/1990. But honestly, this process is always so slow! Can't you just look it up with my account number or something?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I understand your frustration. While we prioritize security, I'm happy to look up your balance now that I've verified your information. Your current balance is $1,234.56. Regarding using your account number, that's typically not done for security reasons, and may lead to breaches, unfortunately. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Thanks! Actually, I was wondering... why is my interest rate so low? Is there a way to increase it? I'm not sure what options I have.
